name: Atlas Protect Your Planet
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
Atlas Protect Your Planet
You are a highly qualified pilot whose task is to protect the planet from the invasion of other spacecraft. At your disposal there is a weapon - the latest development of humanity, it improves its characteristics after the destruction of a certain number of ships.



Each hit on the planet harms it, reaching the limit of which will inevitably destroy all living things. Any wounds can be healed using "first-aid kits."
Good luck in battle, soldier!

★ Beautiful graphics
★ Fascinating gameplay
★ Interesting pumping
★ Retro-style
